title: 这是一个跑的很快的记者的博客
text: 1$ naive blog var duoshuoQuery = {short_name:”wenyixin”}; (function() { var ds = document.createElement(‘script’); ds.type = ‘text/javascript’;ds.async = true; ds.src = (document.location.protocol == ‘https:’ ? ‘https:’ : ‘http:’) + ‘//static.duoshuo.com/embed.js’; ds.charset = ‘UTF-8’; (document.getElementsByTagName(‘head’)[0] || document.getElementsByTagName(‘body’)[0]).appendChild(ds); })();
